data.description:
TOTALLY BASKETBALL lets you play the full sport of Basketball in VR!  Jump for the Tip-Off! Shoot free throws! Steal the ball but don't get a Foul! This game gives you the awesome ability to control your 2 teammates when playing full court 3v3 matches. Use your buttons to move your teammates to better positions or to pass you the ball when you've got a good shot!


Features:
-Practice and tutorial modes for new players
-Multiple teams/venues to choose from (and play against)
-Top notch realistic shooting physics
-Multiplayer (Play against a friend and control your own teams or play a 1 on 1 game of Horse together)
-Customizer (Make your Avatar look as cool as you want)
-Fun seasonal updates (Check out new stadiums and new items throughout the year)
-Large community of people to play with or get tips from (See our Discord)

COMING SOON: 5v5 Multiplayer (up to 10 friends)

changelog.change_log:
Patch Notes (Live v0.403):
Bug Fixes:
Shooting assist now works properly in multiplayer horse.
Fixed an issue causing the ball and AI to disappear when a pass target is jumping.
Corrected an issue causing password protection to fail on multiplayer lobbies.
Remote players set to sitting mode now have the proper height in multiplayer.
Resolved an issue preventing jumping in certain instances where it is needed.
You no longer see your torso for a moment when flipping 180 degrees.
The menu selection laser no longer comes from an odd spot in the hand.
Fixed some missing sounds on menu keyboards.
The AI now properly begin gameplay when one of them fumbles the catch from a tipoff.
Your teammates no longer run up and steal the ball from you.
Smoothed out some dribbling issues from certain conditions.
The AI no longer chase the ball so far out of bounds that they run into other objects.
The crowd now stays in their seats during booth sequences in the Gymnasium.
High passes by the AI are no longer called out as if they were shooting attempts.
Fixed some button selection issues in the menu.
The ball pipe no longer spawns inside the hoop base.
Improvements:
Changes to the tutorial have been made to better explain dribbling and shooting.
You now get a coin for beating a Medium horse player and 2 if you beat the hard player.
Modified the AI’s shooting positions in horse for more variety.
Adjusted tipoff ball slapping for a better feel.
The Quick Menu no longer opens behind the system menu.
Improved crossover detection.
Increased the accuracy of two handed passes.
Adjusted shooting vs passing detection.
Region connection is now faster.
Made some adjustments to maintaining connection when transitioning from a multiplayer lobby into a match.
The AI now express their reactions to events.
Increased performance in the West 4th Street court.
Increased the effectiveness of medium and high shooting assist.
The coaches and mascot no longer pop in and out, they come and go in a puff of smoke.
Some art adjustments to booth prop item sizes.
Updated the thumbs up and thumbs down callout graphics.
New Features:
The AI did some leg training and will now attempt to jump and block your shots.
Added a microphone restart button in the multiplayer lobby.
Players are now prompted with their coin earnings when returning to the locker room.
AI players will now invoke a foul by pushing their opponents to the ground.
You can now select the same teams in multiplayer.
The red zone in horse now informs you the area is unavailable.
Coins are now purchasable, but currently are stored locally so they will be removed if you uninstall the game.
Added a support button with patch notes to the chalkboard.
